dict.acceptation: 公式，准则；客套话；方案；婴儿食品；

sent.orig: Chou formula and Taylor formula,the results from the improved formula are more close to the experiment.
sent.trans: 与实验结果相比，改进的周培基公式计算结果与实验结果更接近。

sent.orig: A simplified calculating method is also presented based on oil-bearing saturation formula and experience formula.
sent.trans: 以含油饱和度公式为基础，结合经验公式，提出了简化计算方法。

sent.orig: Appropriate chemical attribute information, such as structural formula, empirical formula, and molecular weight.
sent.trans: 适当的化学性质资料，比如结构式，经验式和分子量等。

sent.orig: The analysis that the accuracy of the new formula is than that of the existing formula.
sent.trans: 分析表明，新公式精度高于现有公式，且计算简单。

sent.orig: It can help easily solve the probability problem to master inverse-event formula and plus formula.
sent.trans: 在求解概率问题时，掌握逆事件公式与加法公式的运用，会使问题变得简单。
